uvi.product_version: versions from v3.10 to before v5.4.135
uvi.description:
net: ti: fix UAF in tlan_remove_one

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.135 by commit b7e5563f2a7862a9e4796abb9908b092f677e3c1, it was introduced in version v3.10 by commit 1e0a8b13d35510e711fdf72e9a3e30bcb2bd49fa. For more details please see the references link.
